Rubber Duck as a Stress Reliever: Squeeze the rubber duck to release built-up tension and relieve stress.
Rubber Duck as a DIY Mold: Use the rubber duck as a mold to create unique shapes and designs in various materials such as clay, silicone, or even chocolate.
Rubber Duck as a Stenciling Tool: Use the rubber duck as a stencil to create intricate designs on paper or fabric.
Rubber Duck as a Plant Watering Device: Use the rubber duck as a watering device for plants, by filling it with water and placing it in the plant pot.
Rubber Duck as a Cleaning Tool: Use the rubber duck as a cleaning tool to the hard-to- places, such as grout lines or crevices.
